meanings.definition: Showing a pink or red color in the face from shame, modesty, or embarrassment.
meanings.sent1: The blushingly embarrassed girl avoided eye contact.
meanings.sent2: She smiled blushingly when complimented on her dress.
meanings.sent3: The blushingly shy boy tripped over his own feet.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky blushingly pink.
meanings.sent5: Her cheeks turned blushingly red as she spoke in front of the class.

meanings.definition: In a way that shows embarrassment or shyness.
meanings.sent1: She spoke blushingly, avoiding the spotlight.
meanings.sent2: He looked blushingly at the ground, unable to meet her gaze.
meanings.sent3: Blushingly, she admitted to eating the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed blushingly in the spring sun.
meanings.sent5: The child whispered blushingly to his friend about his crush.
